data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Ternopil‘, Ukraine that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ternopil‘, Ukraine
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Ternopil' to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 40,130 believers in Ternopil'.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Ternopil‘, Ukraine to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Orok people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Orok people know you.
Lord, for the leaders in the state of Ternopil', let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Ternopil‘, Ukraine.

data.section_summary:
the state of Ternopil‘, Ukraine has a population of 1,107,300.

We estimate Ternopil' has 40,130 people who might know Jesus, 765,379 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 301,791 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 27 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Ternopil‘, Ukraine.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.
